description: This file implements a Signup page component for a React-based frontend, handling user registration including validation, interaction with Supabase authentication, optional organization creation, and UI rendering.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates form data for username, email, password, confirmation, and optional organization name.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs user registration via Supabase, optionally creates an organization, and redirects upon success or sets error messages.
